titleStmt.title: Artemisa to Cloe. A letter from a lady in the tovvn to a lady in the country; concerning the loves of the tovvn: / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Leach at the Sign of the Crown in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Wilmont Rochester. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Irregular pagination: pages 5 and 8 wrongly numbered 3 and 4.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Sign of the Crown in Cornhil
